hackathon-description-text: IC Hack is back! Running for its sixth consecutive year, we’re inviting 300 of the UK’s most creative and talented students to London to hack on any project that takes their fancy for 24 hours.
hackathon-rules: All attendees, sponsors, partners, volunteers and staff at our hackathon are required to agree with the code of conduct.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The hack has to rely on the Cognitive Services or Microsoft Bot Framework and have at least one of the following:
At least half of the team members must be 1st year undergraduates.

hackathon-description-header: Imperial College London's annual student run hackathon, powered by Microsoft
hackathon-location-description: Imperial College London - South Kensington Campus
